factsheet.heading: Portraits of the South Art Trail
paragraphs:
Public art trail: Portraits of the South by Abi Partington-Moran 
(Saturday 9 September - Friday 7 October FREE)

This innovative artist-created trail in Sutton Town Centre is the first of four Sutton STEAMS Ahead photographic commissions to be unveiled this Autumn/Winter. The installation showcases double exposure photographic portraits of local people on 15 benches along the length of the HIgh Street, as well as in the St Nicholas Way underpass between All Bar One and Wetherspoons. The photographs link via QR codes to recorded interviews which focus on themes of the past, present and future of Sutton.

name: Public art trail: Portraits of the South
